mapper.select: select zipcode,sido,gugun,dong,ri,bldg,bunji,seq from zipcode where dong like '%' || #{dong} || '%'
select distinct gugun from foot_post where sido = '서울'
select addrname from foot_post where gugun=#{gugun} and addrtype=#{addrtype}
select stadium_seq,stadium_name from foot_stadium where user_email=#{user_email}

select booking_seq,to_date(booking_day,'YYYY-MM-DD') as booking_day,to_char(rentalsum, '999,999,999,999,999') as rentalsum,rentalaccount,game1,game2,game3,game4,game5,game6,game7 from foot_booking where booking_seq = #{booking_seq}
select rental_switch from foot_booking_reserve where booking_seq = #{booking_seq} and gametime = #{gametime}
